review: Netflix isn't working.  That's the main reason I got this little guy.  YouTube works great, HBOGo works great, but not Netflix.  I've searched for hours online for a fix.  I've reset the thing many times.  I've changed every router setting I've found any reference to online.  Still doesn't work for Netflix.  I'm not the only one with this problem, either, according to Google's help forum.  I'll keep searching for a fix and gladly change this back to a 5 star once the fix is released.
